Are you middle class?

There are many ways to define middle class. This calculator features 3 different examples that all use household income. For these calculations, your income is adjusted to a household size of 3, which is the closest whole number to the average U.S. household size (2.5).
Please fill in all fields.
Pew Research Center
67% to 200% the national median income
Brookings Institution
20th to 80th percentiles of income
Urban Institute
150% to 500% the federal poverty level
Sources: Census Bureau Current Population Survey via IPUMS (income data); Federal Register (poverty guidelines); Pew Research Center; Brookings Institution; Urban Institute (middle class definitions)
